casebody.data:
Steve CROOKS and Era Lea Crooks
v.
State of Louisiana, DEPARTMENT OF NATURAL RESOURCES NO. 2019-C-0160 Supreme Court of Louisiana. May 6, 2019 ON WRIT OF CERTIORARI TO THE COURT OF APPEAL, THIRD CIRCUIT, PARISH OF RAPIDES

ORDER

Considering the petition of the applicants in the above entitled and numbered matter,

IT IS ORDERED that a writ of review issue and that briefing and argument are limited to Assignment of Error No. 3 : "The lower courts erred in failing to find that the Plaintiffs' inverse condemnation claims have prescribed under either or both La. R.S. 13:5111 or 28 U.S.C. § 2501 ."

WEIMER, J., would order a full grant and docket. GENOVESE, J., recused.
